prompts.frontCover:
A whimsical watercolor birthday card illustration. In the center, a charming cartoon couple is playfully snowboarding down a giant, exaggerated wave made entirely of sushi. The wave is composed of colorful maki rolls, nigiri with salmon and tuna, and shrimp tempura rolls, all rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style. The couple is depicted mid-action on their snowboards, laughing joyously. He is slightly ahead, looking back with a wide, happy grin, and she is right behind him, her arms outstretched for balance with a playful, excited expression. Splashes of soy sauce and wasabi, painted like watercolor splatters, fly up from their boards instead of snow. The background is a simple, soft pastel wash of light blue and white, suggesting a snowy mountain sky, but with abstract, dreamy clouds. In the center of the scene, in a beautiful, readable, handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday, Jordan!". Flat 2D artwork, watercolor painting style with soft edges and vibrant, blended colors.

REFINEMENT NOTE: A rough draft of this exact image is provided as reference. Create a high-quality final version that:
- Maintains the exact same composition, character positions, and overall design
- Enhances details, textures, and color vibrancy
- Corrects any minor imperfections or artifacts
- Adds professional polish while staying true to the draft
- Think of this as the "final art" version of the provided sketch

ORIGINAL CONTEXT TO MAINTAIN:
- To: Jordan
- From: Lao Lao
- Relationship: Jordan is Lao Lao's Boyfriend
- Personal Traits to incorporate: Snowboarding and sushi
prompts.backCover: A minimalist and elegant watercolor design for the back of a greeting card. The background is a clean, off-white with a subtle paper texture. In the upper-left quadrant, a single, beautifully detailed piece of salmon nigiri sushi is painted in a vibrant, soft watercolor style. To its right, a delicate, artistic splash of soy sauce, rendered as a gentle brown watercolor splatter. The composition is simple and occupies about 20% of the top-left area, leaving the rest of the card, especially the bottom-right corner, completely clear. Flat 2D artwork with organic paint bleeds and soft edges.
prompts.leftInterior: A decorative border design for the left interior of a greeting card, in a whimsical watercolor style. The background is a soft pastel blue wash, reminiscent of a clear sky, with a visible paper texture. A dynamic, flowing border frames the page, composed of abstract watercolor elements inspired by sushi and snowboarding. On one side, a vibrant orange and pink swirl suggests salmon, while on the other, a splash of pale green represents wasabi. Interspersed are elegant, swooping lines like snowboard tracks, creating a sense of movement. This decorative border covers about 40% of the visual space, leaving the center clear. Flat 2D artwork, no text or figures.
prompts.rightInterior:
A minimalist watercolor accent for the right interior of a greeting card, designed to leave ample space for a handwritten message. The background is a clean, off-white with a subtle paper texture. In the bottom-left corner, a small, elegant arrangement of artistic watercolor splashes in soft blues, oranges, and greens. The splashes are delicate and abstract, suggesting the joy of the front cover's theme without being literal. This decorative element is minimal, occupying about 20% of the corner space and gracefully framing the large open area for text. Flat 2D artwork, vibrant but soft colors, with organic paint bleeds.

Display this exact text in elegant, clearly readable handwritten script: "Hey Jordan,

Happy birthday to my favorite human! I was going to make a joke about you getting old, but then I remembered I have to date you, so I'll be nice. You're aging like a fine wine... that I'm very lucky to get to drink. I love you more than cake, and that's saying a lot.

All my love,
Lao Lao"
